name: Tej Pratap Singh
tagline: A passionate software engineer building modern web experiences.

about.title: About Me
description: Software Engineer with a strong background in Java-based development, including Spring MVC, Hibernate, and REST API design. With over 5 years of experience, I bring robust analytical skills, a passion for clean coding practices, and a proactive approach to optimizing system architecture and performance.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Analyzed, designed, and developed RESTful services for various modules using Spring and Java.
Performed high-level design and implemented changes to existing application.
Built complex enhancements, resolved bugs, and developed comprehensive unit tests using JUnit.
Collaborated with QA teams to review test plans and ensure consistent product functionality and quality.
Used JIRA and Confluence for bug tracking, issue tracking, and project management. Jenkins pipelines for continuous integration and delivery.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Develop backend restful web services in Spring-MVC using Spring Boot, Spring Dependency Injection (DI), and Spring Annotations and extensively used Java 8 capabilities.
Developed controllers in Spring MVC which delegates the request from front end to the delegator layer which make calls with backend systems.
Implemented various J2EE design patterns such as MVC, Factory, Singleton and DAO.

manualProjects.name: Singh Law Associates
manualProjects.description: Singh Law Associates is a Portfolio website for a Law firm in Lucknow. This website beautifully conveys the agenda of the firm and also helps users to connect directly with them. It is fully responsive and mobile-ready. Click on the image to get redirected to it.

skills: Java, Spring Boot, Git, GitHub, VS Code, Maven, Gradle, MySQL, OracleDB
